welcomeScreen.title: Hello, welcome to the app!
welcomeScreen.description: This is a simple app that demonstrates how to use the authentication flow in your app.

registerScreen.title: Create Account
registerScreen.description: Create your own account to get started

forgotPasswordScreen.title: Forgot Password
forgotPasswordScreen.description: Enter your email address to reset your password

onboardingScreen.title: Hi, glad to see you!
onboardingScreen.description: Looks like you are new here! Let's get to know each other better.

slides.name: How should I call you?
slides.notifications: Do you want to enable push notifications?
slides.premium: Would you like to try the premium package?

alert.title: Delete Account
alert.description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

resetPasswordScreen.title: Reset Password
resetPasswordScreen.description: Enter your email address to reset your password then check your email for a code to reset your password

setNewPasswordScreen.title: Set New Password
setNewPasswordScreen.description: Enter a code sent to your email address and set a new password

verifyEmailScreen.title: Verify your email
verifyEmailScreen.description: Enter the verification code sent to your email address

verifyCodeScreen.title: Enter verification code
verifyCodeScreen.description: After you provide verification code, you will be able to sign in to your account. Then you can change your password on the account settings screen.

appUpdateScreen.title: Update Available!
appUpdateScreen.description: Keep Your App Running Smoothly. One Tap Away!

pushNotifications.title: Push Notifications
pushNotifications.description: Stay up to date with the latest news and updates

dailyReminder.title: Daily Reminder
dailyReminder.description: Get daily reminders to keep you on track

trialBanner.title: Try Premium for Free
trialBanner.description: Unlock all features and enjoy the best experience

register.title: Account Created!
register.message: Your account has been successfully created.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password Email Sent!
forgotPassword.message: Please check your email for a code to login into your account.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password Email Sent!
resetPassword.message: Please check your email for a code to reset your password.

verifyEmail.title: Email Verified!
verifyEmail.message: Your email has been successfully verified.

verifyCode.title: Code Verified!
verifyCode.message: Your code has been successfully verified.

updateProfile.title: Profile Updated!
updateProfile.message: Your profile has been successfully updated.

updateImage.title: Image Updated!
updateImage.message: Your image has been successfully updated.

updatePassword.title: Password Updated!
updatePassword.message: Your password has been successfully updated.

deleteAccount.title: Account Deleted!
deleteAccount.message: Your account has been successfully deleted.

logout.title: Logged Out!
logout.message: You have been successfully logged out.

baseError.title: Error Occurred!
baseError.message: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

passwordNotMatch.title: Password Not Match!
passwordNotMatch.message: Please make sure your password and confirm password are the same.

oauth.title: OAuth Error
oauth.message: Something went wrong with the OAuth process. Please try again later.
